item.title: 综合考试20221215总结
item.description: 文献 Title Single-cell meta-analyses reveal responses of tumor-reactive CXCL13+ T cells to immune-checkpoint blockade Author: Baolin Liu , Yuanyuan Zhang, Dongfang Wang, Xueda Hu and Zemin Zhang Abstract Immune-checkpoint blockade (ICB) therapies represent a paradigm shift in the treatment of human cancers; however, it remains incompletely understood how tumor-reactive T cells respond to ICB across tumor types. Here, we demonstrate that measuring CXCL13 expression could effectively identify both precursor and terminally differentiated tumor-reactive CD8+ T cells within tumors. Applying this approach, we performed meta-analyses of published single-cell data for CXCL13+CD8+ T cells in 225 samples from 102 patients treated with ICB across five cancer types. We found that CXCL13+CD8+ T cells were correlated with favorable responses to ICB, and the treatment further increased such cells in responsive tumors.
